sentences.sContent: In order to steal it out, Odysseus and Diomedes slipped into the capital one night in  disguise , known to none but Hellen.
sentences.sCn: 为了将神像偷出城, 一天夜里奥德修斯和狄俄墨德斯乔装改扮潜入首都, 这一切只有海伦知道。

sentences.sContent: There he helped Odysseus when the hero came to him for advice.
sentences.sCn: 在那儿，当奥德修斯前去征求他的意见时，泰瑞西斯帮助了他。

trans.tranOther: one of the foremost of the Greek heroes at the siege of Troy, noted for his courage and ingenuity
